sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; const Header = () => { let listener = null const [scrollState, setScrollState] = useState("top") useEffect(() => { listener = document.addEventListener("scroll", e => { var scrolled = document.scrollingElement.scrollTop if (scrolled >= 120) { if (scrollState !== "amir") { setScrollState("amir") } } else { if (scrollState !== "top") { setScrollState("top") } } }) return () => { document.removeEventListener("scroll", listener) } }, [scrollState]) return ( {/*
*/}

); }; export default Header;
